features: [𝐑𝐞𝐥𝐢𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐐𝐮𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲]: Made from high-quality, scratch-resistant aluminum alloy, get excellent wear resistance and heat dissipation. The male USB C and female USB connectors & the male USB and female USB-C connectors are designed to be plugged and unplugged up to 20,000 times.
[𝐇𝐢𝐠𝐡-𝐒𝐩𝐞𝐞𝐝 𝐃𝐚𝐭𝐚 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐟𝐞𝐫]: Featuring speeds of up to 10Gbps, this USB C to USB Adapter with USB 3.0 adapter offers you superspeed to transfer and sync large files, movies, music, and more.

[𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐭𝐨 𝐂𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐲 𝐔𝐒𝐁]: Plug and play, no driver required. Simple structure, lightweight and portability, USB-C to USB-A & USB-A to USB-C OTG adapter is made of aluminum alloy metal with minimal design and delicate metal frame.
[𝐔𝐧𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐚𝐥 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲]: This USB to USBC-C adapter provides compatibility with USB-A devices. It is your convenient solution to connect standard USB to USB C Adapter for laptop/tablet/phone, etc.

[𝐏𝐚𝐜𝐤 𝐨𝐟 𝟒]: OTG USB C adapter and USB A adapter, 2 * [USB-C to USB-A] and 2 * [USB-A to USB-C] compatible devices Apple/Samsung/Google/laptop/desktop computer/charging head/card reader/USB disk/keyboard/mouse/charging bank/car charger/(including but not limited to) Small size, grab-and-go, ready to use for anytime. Convenient for your daily use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't recommend them highly enough!
reviews.reviewText: The Himap Pack of 4 USB C to USB Adapters have been a game-changer for me when it comes to connecting and charging my devices. These adapters are versatile, reliable, and have quickly become an essential part of my tech gear. Here's why I can't recommend them enough:Versatile Compatibility: These adapters offer a simple yet effective solution to bridging the gap between different USB connector types. With two USB-C to USB-A and two USB-A to USB-C adapters in one pack, I can connect almost any device effortlessly. Whether it's my iPhone, PC, Samsung tablet, iPad, or laptop, these adapters have me covered.SuperSpeed Data Transfer: The SuperSpeed data transfer capabilities ensure that my files and data transfer swiftly and smoothly between devices. This is especially useful when I need to back up important documents or transfer large media files.Fast Charging Support: These adapters are not just for data transfer; they also support fast charging. When I'm in a hurry and need a quick power boost, these adapters deliver. It's like having a fast charger for all my devices without having to buy separate cables.Compact and Portable: The compact design of these adapters makes them highly portable. I can easily slip them into my pocket, bag, or even attach them to my keychain using the included keyring, ensuring I'm always prepared for any connection needs on the go.Sturdy and Durable Build: These adapters are built to withstand daily wear and tear. They feel solid and well-constructed, giving me confidence that they'll last a long time.Affordable and Convenient: Getting four adapters in one pack at an affordable price is a fantastic value. It's great to have extras on hand for family and friends or to keep as backups.Saves Money and Reduces Clutter: Instead of buying multiple cables for different devices, these adapters simplify my tech setup and reduce cable clutter. Plus, it's a cost-effective way to adapt my existing cables.In conclusion, the Himap Pack of 4 USB C to USB Adapters have truly simplified my tech life. Their versatile compatibility, fast data transfer, and charging support make them indispensable accessories. Whether you're connecting, charging, or transferring data between various devices, these adapters are a must-have. I can't recommend them highly enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are well built
reviews.reviewText: Good design, snug fit, no sharp corners, they don't look or feel cheap. Good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Need to know
reviews.reviewText: The product I received is fine. My issue is I need to plug a male apple flash connector into a USB. If this seller has a product that can solve my issue great!!! Is it available? How much? If not, then I would have to return the product I received.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars made with durable, high quality materials
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed with the weight/quality of materials used to make these. Has an etched diamond design grip just big enough to be helpful, but small enough to not make the whole thing feel like sandpaper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I did not expect these adapters to be as well made as they are. I expect a small plastic device that encases the circuit boards inside. To my surprise (I guess I should have read) they are good and solid and work very well. I don’t have concerns of them failing anytime soon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great solid feel
reviews.reviewText: Crazy enough it feels as high quality as it seems to operate at. I was shocked in a world of lightweight and plastic, these are neither. They feel like they are great quality for sure. Very solid and works great for adapting the various connectors I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was able to transfer videos from phone directly to USB.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good adapters - Solid build, fast speeds, don't get hot
reviews.reviewText: These USB adapters feel solidly built, and (unlike some others I have) have a satisfying "click" when cords are inserted, and when they are inserted into the computer. They fit snugly, but also are not too tight. They perform very well with my MacBook Pro: My fast SanDisk Extreme SSD transfers data basically just as fast when routed through two of them (chained together, in my third photo) as it does when plugged directly into the computer (without either adapter). Even when running through both adapters (SSD to USB-C to USB-A to USB C to the computer) it transferred a 4 gigabyte video file in about 6 seconds. Also, unlike some USB accessories, these don't get hot to the touch even when piping a lot of data. These are good adapters that will allow you to keep your USB-A peripherals dependably connected to your USB-C inputs, and vice versa.The only minus for me is that the USB-C to USB-A adapters are quite long (nearly 1.5 inches - twice as long as others I have). I prefer the compactness of some other brands, if only to minimize the leverage cords exert pulling down on the USB socket. It's not a defect or deal-breaker, but just a form preference.
